description: A stunning Baroque masterpiece with a grand dome and breathtaking frescoes in the heart of Malá Strana.
A surreal journey into the mind of Kafka, featuring eerie exhibits and his literary legacy.
A historic riverside house celebrating Czech culture, humor, and the life of playwright Jan Werich.
A charming island oasis with picturesque views, art installations, and hidden corners along the Vltava River.
Giant, faceless sculptures by David Černý that add a bizarre touch to Prague’s modern art scene.

header: MUSEUM OF ALCHEMISTS AND MAGICIANS OF OLD PRAGUE
description: A mystical museum revealing the secrets of Prague’s alchemical past and occult legends.
